summary: A collection of concise PyTorch Lightning scripts that illustrate core workflows such as training an autoencoder, building a lightweight image classifier, running a transformer language model, and profiling model execution. Each example bundles data handling, model definition, training loops, and command‑line configuration for CPU, GPU, and distributed setups.
business_intent: To educate developers on leveraging PyTorch Lightning for rapid prototyping and production‑ready pipelines, demonstrating best practices for model encapsulation, data modules, multi‑device training, and performance profiling.
